statements: SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_sites;
SELECT site_name, disposal_capacity FROM waste_disposal_sites;
SELECT site_name, latitude, longitude FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE disposal_capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_sites ORDER BY site_id DESC;
SELECT site_name, longitude FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE latitude < 40;
SELECT site_name, latitude, longitude FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE disposal_capacity > 100 ORDER BY site_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE disposal_capacity < 500 ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT site_id, site_name FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT site_id, site_name, latitude, longitude FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE disposal_capacity > 200 ORDER BY disposal_capacity DESC, site_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE site_name LIKE 'A%' AND disposal_capacity BETWEEN 100 AND 300 ORDER BY site_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM waste_disposal_sites ORDER BY site_name;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE disposal_type = 'Landfill' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT site_name, ST_X(location) AS longitude, ST_Y(location) AS latitude FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE id = 3;
SELECT decision_id, decision_description, decision_date FROM strategic_decisions WHERE site_id = 5 ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_sites;
SELECT id, site_name FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE disposal_type='Recycling';
SELECT site_name, ST_AsText(location) AS location FROM waste_disposal_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT decision_description, decision_date FROM strategic_decisions ORDER BY decision_date ASC;
SELECT s.site_name, COUNT(sd.decision_id) AS decision_count FROM waste_disposal_sites s LEFT JOIN strategic_decisions sd ON s.id = sd.site_id GROUP BY s.site_name ORDER BY decision_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM SiteMaintenance
SELECT site_name, location FROM WasteSites ORDER BY site_name
SELECT id, capacity, opening_date FROM WasteSites WHERE capacity > 1000
SELECT * FROM SiteReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT site_name, capacity, opening_date FROM WasteSites WHERE location = POINT(1.23, 4.56)
SELECT * FROM WasteSites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM WasteSites WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT site_name, opening_date, location FROM WasteSites ORDER BY opening_date DESC;
SELECT site_name, capacity, COUNT(id) AS num_reports FROM WasteSites JOIN SiteReports ON WasteSites.id = SiteReports.site_id GROUP BY site_name, capacity;

SELECT site_name, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM WasteSites JOIN SiteMaintenance ON WasteSites.id = SiteMaintenance.site_id WHERE maintenance_cost > 500 ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_sites;
SELECT site_id, site_name, location FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE disposal_capacity > 1000;
SELECT operator_name, contact_info FROM site_operators ORDER BY operator_name DESC;
SELECT site_id, date, amount_collected FROM disposal_history WHERE amount_collected BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM site_usage WHERE usage_date >= '2022-01-01' AND usage_date <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT site_name, location FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE disposal_capacity > 10000;
SELECT history_id, date, amount_collected FROM disposal_history ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT operator_name, contact_info FROM site_operators WHERE operator_name LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT site_id, usage_date FROM site_usage WHERE usage_type = 'Recycling' ORDER BY usage_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM site_usage JOIN waste_disposal_sites ON site_usage.site_id = waste_disposal_sites.site_id WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM waste_disposal_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT site_name, capacity FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM waste_collection_trucks WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2021-10-01';
SELECT truck_id, current_location FROM waste_collection_trucks ORDER BY truck_id;
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY site_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT site_name, location FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE site_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT site_id, count(truck_id) AS total_trucks_assigned FROM disposal_site_assignments GROUP BY site_id HAVING total_trucks_assigned > 1

SELECT wds.site_name, ss.total_waste_collected FROM waste_disposal_sites wds INNER JOIN site_statistics ss ON wds.site_id = ss.site_id WHERE ss.total_waste_collected > 5000 ORDER BY ss.total_waste_collected DESC

SELECT td.truck_name, ts.total_distance_traveled FROM waste_collection_trucks td INNER JOIN truck_statistics ts ON td.truck_id = ts.truck_id WHERE ts.average_speed > 50 ORDER BY ts.total_distance_traveled ASC
